hero.name: I'm Harvey Wu
hero.title: Frontend Engineer
hero.desc1: A passionate Frontend Engineer with over 3 years of web development experience.
hero.desc2: Proficient in JavaScript and React, with working knowledge of Next.js and React Native. Committed to delivering high-quality, maintainable code.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: I'm Harvey, a Frontend Engineer with nearly 3 years of experience focused on building maintainable and scalable React ecosystems and cross-platform applications.

growth.title: Learning & Growth
growth.content: Proficient in React and JavaScript, with ongoing investment in TypeScript, React Native, and React Query. Through side projects, I've expanded into full-stack development — building Node.js APIs with Hono, implementing Next.js apps, managing Monorepo architecture with Turborepo, and publishing npm packages.

company1.name: Huaneng Square · Frontend Engineer
company1.item1: Led internal npm package development and publishing for team-wide reuse
company1.item2: Refactored legacy code and resolved SonarQube issues, reducing code smells by 40%

company2.name: PGTalk · Frontend Engineer
company2.item1: Collaborated closely with designers to implement core business pages and features

strengths.title: Strengths
items: Strong focus on code quality with a habit of self-review and refactoring during development
Capable of independently diagnosing issues and systematically locating and fixing bugs
Applies critical thinking when evaluating technical solutions, prioritizing practical fit over trends
Stays current with frontend ecosystem trends and evaluates new technologies for adoption value
Effective cross-functional collaborator, aligning with designers and backend engineers on requirements

items.title: Frontend Engineer
descriptions: Led incremental migration from JavaScript to TypeScript, establishing type boundaries and ESLint rules to reduce maintenance cost and runtime risk.
Drove code refactoring with SonarQube metrics, reducing technical debt issues from 3,011 to ~1,400 (a 53% decrease).
Built an enterprise UI component library using shadcn/ui + Tailwind v4, with Storybook documentation and Vitest test coverage.
Designed API Factory and Router Guard patterns to establish frontend architecture guardrails, and resolved async rendering bugs through React state optimization.
Automated CI/CD pipelines via Jenkinsfile, eliminated plaintext env vars from version control, improving deployment security and transparency.

items.title: Frontend Engineer
descriptions: Developed and maintained core features for the Atong points admin panel and investor platform using React.js / Next.js.
Refactored tightly-coupled code by abstracting data logic into Custom Hooks and encapsulating reusable UI components.
Integrated React Hook Form with a custom date picker to precisely meet PM requirements and improve form validation performance.
Optimized codebase by removing component declarations inside components, reducing unnecessary re-renders and improving maintainability.

items.title: MES Frontend Engineer
descriptions: Participated in production line system development, implementing .NET backend API endpoints.
Maintained legacy station systems and introduced frontend input validation to significantly reduce human operation errors.
Handled cross-department communication to clarify user requirements and assist in diagnosing and resolving production data anomalies.

contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities. Whether it's a collaboration or just a hello, feel free to reach out!

form.title: Get In Touch
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and your message will be sent directly to my inbox. I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
